title: Saint-Gaudens National Historic Site: Blow-Me-Down Farm Call for Interest
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Blow-Me-Down Farm Call for Interest              Blow-Me-Down Farm  Call for Interest       Cornish, NHâ€”The National Park Service at Saint-Gaudens National Historic Site announces the release of a Call for Interest for the buildings at the Blow-Me-Down Farm property in Cornish, New Hampshire. The Call for Interest is open until November 30, 2015 and proposals should adhere to the park's vision for Blow-Me-Down Farm to serve as a "National Park for the Arts," providing space for art creation, arts education, arts performance, and historic preservation.   Call for Interest, PDF with links for online interaction   Call for Interest, PDF for printing
